parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: DstType
parameters.description: The type of the service to which the de-identified data belongs. Valid values: **1**, **2**, **3**, **4**, and **5**. The value 1 indicates MaxCompute. The value 2 indicates OSS. The value indicates AnalyticDB for MySQL. The value 4 indicates Tablestore. The value 5 indicates ApsaraDB RDS.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh_cn**. Valid values:

*   **zh_cn**: Chinese
*   **en_us**: English

parameters.name: MainProcessId
parameters.description:
The ID of the task.

> If a task has one or more subtasks, the value of the parameter must be the ID of the task. Otherwise, leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SrcTableName
parameters.description: The name of the source table.

parameters.name: SrcType
parameters.description: The type of the service to which the data to be de-identified belongs. Valid values: **1**, **2**, **3**, **4**, and **5**. The value 1 indicates MaxCompute. The value 2 indicates Object Storage Service (OSS). The value indicates AnalyticDB for MySQL. The value 4 indicates Tablestore. The value 5 indicates ApsaraDB RDS.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the de-identification task. Valid values:

*   **-1**: waiting
*   **0**: being executed
*   **1**: executed
*   **2**: failed to be executed
*   **3**: terminated
*   **4**: partially failed

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the de-identification task.
